Hero.title: Front-End Developer
Hero.subtitle: Creating clean, modern, and user-focused web interfaces

About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: My Story
About.intro: I'm Nagham ElGreeny, a Front-End Developer from Egypt, born on March 30, 2001. I'm passionate about creating clean, modern, and user-focused web interfaces. My journey in development started from my love for logical thinking and problem-solving, and it grew into a strong drive to build functional and visually appealing digital experiences.
About.passion: I enjoy transforming ideas into interactive designs, organizing project structures, and writing clean, reusable, and maintainable code.
About.whatIDoDesc: I specialize in building responsive, scalable, and production-ready applications using modern technologies and best practices.

strengthsList.organized: Organized with sharp attention to detail
strengthsList.hungry: Always hungry to learn and grow

About.experience: Former roles: Search Ads Evaluator (Appen), Medical Data Entry, Property Sales
About.current: Currently focused fully on Front-End Development
About.personalityDesc: I'm an ENTP with a creative, energetic personality. I love art, sketching, walking, dancing to warm up, trying new experiences, and having deep meaningful conversations. I enjoy both calm and lively environments and get inspiration from moving, thinking, and exploring.

goalsList.portfolio: Build a strong and modern 2025 portfolio
goalsList.position: Get an entry-level Front-End position in Tanta or Mansoura
goalsList.skills: Strengthen advanced skills in Next.js, TypeScript, clean architecture, and state management
goalsList.work: Produce work that reflects my ambition and professionalism
